_sText:
Mg_Castle_V2
The Objective of the game basically is too kill the other team before they kill you obviously. You can also destroy their castle with the cannons. Cannons now kill on impact. Thanks to Tomgreen for helping me find and fix a lot of bugs. **Fixed** Thanks to the update the cannon balls would not break the castles but no worries it's all been fixed and it has some added secrets to it now. Made By:Slayer
